Title: Proposes an amendment to section 2 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to increasing term limits and limiting the number of terms
Summary: Relates to increasing term limits and limiting the number of terms of office a member of the legislature may serve.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 2 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to increasing the terms of office of members of the legislature and limiting the terms of office as a member of the legislature any person may serve
